data.name: FooterDescription
data.value: Not ready-made templates, but software that fits you. We create solutions for organizations and teams to have software perfectly aligned with their workflows.

data.name: ServicesPageDesc
data.value: We offer expertise in four main areas, addressing your organization's unique needs.

data.name: Svc1Tagline
data.value: Systems built exclusively for your organization, perfectly aligned with your processes.

data.name: Svc1Text
data.value: Off-the-shelf software may not fit your organization's unique structure. At Tailcode, we analyze your workflows in detail and design exactly the system you need from scratch.

data.name: Svc2Text
data.value: Are you using Excel spreadsheets, email chains, and manual tracking systems? Digitize these processes to save time and minimize errors.

data.name: Svc3Tagline
data.value: Make your data meaningful, support your decisions.

data.name: Svc3Text
data.value: Is the data accumulated in your organization valuable but scattered? We combine data from different systems to create custom reports and executive dashboards.

data.name: Svc3Item2
data.value: Making sense of existing system data

data.name: Svc3Item3
data.value: Excel / Python / API based data processing

data.name: Svc4Tagline
data.value: Quickly materialize ideas, test before investing.

data.name: Svc4Text
data.value: Want to test your idea before making a big investment? We validate your concept by creating rapid prototypes, enabling you to get real user feedback.

data.name: ProcessText
data.value: We follow five fundamental steps in every project.

data.name: Process1Text
data.value: We deeply understand your needs, processes, and current issues.

data.name: Process2Text
data.value: We clarify the problem, define the solution scope and expectations.

data.name: Process3Text
data.value: We materialize the idea with a working prototype, getting quick feedback.

data.name: Process4Text
data.value: We develop the full solution based on the approved prototype.

data.name: Process5Text
data.value: We deliver the solution and provide user guides and technical documentation.

data.name: ServicesCTA
data.value: Which service is right for you?

data.name: ServicesCTAText
data.value: Let's discuss your needs and determine the best solution together.

data.name: HeroSubtitle
data.value: We create solutions for organizations and teams to have software perfectly aligned with their unique workflows.

data.name: ProblemText
data.value: Ready-made software covers 70% of organizational needs. But the remaining 30% is often the most critical part.

data.name: ServicesText
data.value: At Tailcode, we offer expertise in four main areas.

data.name: Step1Text
data.value: We understand your problem, expectations, and current situation.

data.name: Step2Text
data.value: We map existing processes and identify bottlenecks.

data.name: Step3Text
data.value: We design custom solutions and create prototypes.

data.name: Step4Text
data.value: We develop and deliver the approved solution.

data.name: Step5Text
data.value: Post-launch support and improvements are always available.

data.name: LimitsText
data.value: To stay focused, we clearly define what we don't do.

data.name: CTAText
data.value: Contact us to talk about a custom solution for you.

data.name: ProblemItem2
data.value: Creates manual solutions and temporary workarounds

data.name: ServiceCustomSoftwareDesc
data.value: Internal systems, cross-department workflow solutions, custom panels and authorization structures.

data.name: ServiceWorkflowDesc
data.value: Task and tracking systems, meeting management, process mapping and digitalization of manual work.

data.name: ServiceDataReportingDesc
data.value: Custom reports, data processing solutions, Excel/Python/API integrations and executive dashboards.

data.name: ServicePrototypeDesc
data.value: Fast working prototypes, clickable interfaces and solutions tested with real scenarios.

data.name: MethodologyText
data.value: We start by understanding the problem, then design a solution tailored to you.

data.name: LimitItem1
data.value: We don't make websites for everyone

data.name: LimitItem3
data.value: We don't take on "just make something" projects

data.name: LimitItem4
data.value: We don't accept requests without a clear problem

data.name: AboutDescription
data.value: A software partner that understands your problem and creates custom solutions.

data.name: WhatIsText
data.value: Tailcode is a software solutions company founded so that organizations, teams, and institutions can have software perfectly aligned with their workflows without being forced to fit into ready-made templates.

data.name: NotAgency
data.value: Tailcode is not a software agency.

data.name: NotProduct
data.value: Tailcode is not a product company.

data.name: NotEverything
data.value: Tailcode is not a "we do everything" structure.

data.name: IsPartner
data.value: Tailcode is a software partner that understands the problem and creates custom solutions.

data.name: VisionText
data.value: A world where organizations work with software that perfectly fits their processes, where technology is an enabler, not an obstacle.

data.name: MissionText
data.value: To understand the critical 30% that ready-made solutions don't cover and create custom software for it.

data.name: TargetText
data.value: Tailcode focuses on a specific customer profile. We create solutions for the right needs, not for everyone.

data.name: Target1Desc
data.value: Organizations requiring complex workflows and coordination between multiple departments.

data.name: Target2Desc
data.value: Teams resorting to manual solutions due to limitations of existing software.

data.name: Target3Desc
data.value: Decision makers who understand their organization's unique needs and seek custom solutions.

data.name: LimitItem1Desc
data.value: We don't do general-purpose website development. Our focus is enterprise solutions.

data.name: LimitItem2Desc
data.value: We don't offer ready-made templates or package solutions. Every project is custom designed.

data.name: LimitItem3Desc
data.value: We don't start a project without a clear problem definition.

data.name: LimitItem4Desc
data.value: If there's no concrete problem to solve, we don't start.

data.name: LimitItem5Desc
data.value: We don't compete with general-purpose products like Slack, Discord, or OBS.

data.name: WorkWithUsDesc
data.value: Let us understand your organization's unique needs and create a solution together.

data.name: ContactDescription
data.value: Contact us to discuss your project or ask questions.

data.name: SendMessageDesc
data.value: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

data.name: ContactMeetingDesc
data.value: We start with a free discovery call.

data.name: FAQ1A
data.value: Yes, the discovery call is free.

data.name: FAQ2Q
data.value: How long does a project take?

data.name: FAQ2A
data.value: It depends on scope. Prototypes take 2-4 weeks, full projects can take 2-6 months.

data.name: FAQ3A
data.value: Yes, we can handle all our projects remotely.

data.name: LetsStartDesc
data.value: Tell us about your project, let's create a solution together.

data.name: SolutionsDescription
data.value: We address the critical 30% that off-the-shelf systems don't cover.

data.name: ScenariosText
data.value: Here are typical problems that Tailcode solves.

data.name: Sol1Item1
data.value: Disrupts workflow and slows down processes

data.name: Sol1Item3
data.value: Results in manual solutions and temporary workarounds

data.name: Scenario1Text
data.value: Are you managing processes in Excel spreadsheets? Data scattered, updates difficult, and reporting a nightmare?

data.name: Scenario1Solution
data.value: We create a custom process management system.

data.name: Scenario2Text
data.value: Do approval processes, task tracking, and communication run through email? Who did what, where are we?

data.name: Scenario2Solution
data.value: We set up a centralized workflow platform.

data.name: Scenario3Text
data.value: Using different software but no integration between them? Is data being entered repeatedly?

data.name: Scenario3Solution
data.value: We create a layer that connects your systems.

data.name: Scenario4Text
data.value: Need to collect data from different sources for management reports? Manual calculations involved?

data.name: Scenario4Solution
data.value: We provide automatic reporting and dashboard solutions.

data.name: Scenario5Text
data.value: Have standardized processes but inconsistent implementation? Cross-department coordination difficult?

data.name: Scenario6Title
data.value: "We have an idea but can't test it"

data.name: Scenario6Text
data.value: Have an idea for a new process or system? Want to test it before making a big investment?

data.name: Scenario6Solution
data.value: We materialize ideas with rapid prototypes.

data.name: ApproachLead
data.value: We start every project with the question "Do we really understand this problem?"

data.name: ApproachText1
data.value: Understanding the problem fully before proposing a solution is the most important step. That's why we conduct detailed analysis, map existing processes, and talk to real users for every project.

data.name: ApproachText2
data.value: Our goal is not "to make software" but "to solve a problem." This difference directly affects the quality of the resulting solution.

data.name: ResultTimeDesc
data.value: Manual tasks get automated, teams focus on their core work.

data.name: ResultConsistencyDesc
data.value: Standard processes reduce errors and increase quality.

data.name: ResultVisibilityDesc
data.value: Clear reports and dashboards for data-driven decisions.

data.name: ResultFitDesc
data.value: Custom designed for you, perfectly fits your workflow.

data.name: SolutionsCTAText
data.value: Share your organization's process challenges, let's find a solution together.
